title: Ukraine’s Counteroffensive Forces Face Mobilized Inmates and Drones
description: Ukraine has been pushing a counteroffensive in the east and south, applying greater pressure to Russian forces, but there is no indication of any mass Russian withdrawal.

title: Biden Pays Homage to Queen Elizabeth as ‘Decent, Honorable’
description: The U.S. president will be one of dozens of world leaders attending the funeral on Monday for a royal who had ruled for nearly as long as the president has lived.

title: The Singular Offense of the Mass Grave
description: Violent loss is even more devastating when the dead are disposed of without identification. Russian flight in Ukraine leaves a trail of littered corpses.

title: Your Monday Briefing: Queen Elizabeth II’s Funeral
description: Plus a powerful typhoon lashes Japan and cheetahs return to India.

title: It’s not just princes and presidents. The guest list for the queen’s funeral also includes everyday heroes.
description: Among those invited to Queen Elizabeth II’s funeral are almost 200 people who were honored for various forms of public service this year.

title: It’s not just princes and presidents. The guest list for the queen’s funeral also includes everyday heroes.
description: Among those invited to Queen Elizabeth II’s funeral are almost 200 people who were honored for various forms of public service this year.

title: Ukraine’s Military Says Iranian Attack Drones Have Reached the Battlefield
description: A Ukrainian colonel said attacks that took out howitzers and armored vehicles were carried out by Iranian-made drones that had not previously been used outside of the Middle East.

title: Is Choosing Medically Assisted Death Too Easy in Canada?
description: Since the government expanded the eligibility for assisted death last year to include those with disabilities, critics have been saying there should be more checks and balances.

title: Alla Pugacheva, Russian Pop Star, Comes Out Against Ukraine War
description: Alla Pugacheva, whose stardom has spanned from the Soviet era to after the Cold War, said the invasion of Ukraine had turned Russia into a “pariah.”

title: A Russian attack during an evacuation of psychiatric patients kills four Ukrainian health care workers.
Pelosi, in Armenia, Condemns Azerbaijan Over Clashes
description: Fighting last week, the deadliest between the two countries since 2020, was “initiated by the Azeris,” Speaker Nancy Pelosi said, while also calling for a negotiated settlement.

title: The View From Russia
description: Russians near Ukraine are starting to hear the sound of explosions, and their worries are growing.

title: Powerful Typhoon Thrashes Japan, With Millions Told to Evacuate
description: The storm, called Nanmadol, carried gales and heavy rain as it was expected to creep up nearly the entire length of the country.

title: A Welsh Village Embraces Its Bond With the Queen
description: A disaster at Aberfan, a small Welsh community, almost 60 years ago forged an unusual link between the community and the queen. The atmosphere there today — quiet grief coupled with brief flashes of dissent — encapsulates the national mood.

title: Powerful Earthquake Strikes Taiwan
description: A southeastern county was shaken by a strong temblor for the second day in a row, and the authorities were working to assess damage.

title: Russia Advances on Key City in Eastern Ukraine
description: Recent setbacks haven’t deterred Russian forces from advancing on the city of Bakhmut, which is critical to claiming all of the Donbas region. In the south, power was restored to the Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant.

title: In South Korea, President Yoon Treads Fine Line Between U.S. and China
description: Yoon Suk-yeol has aligned his country more closely with the United States, but there are limits to how far he can go without angering China or provoking North Korea.

title: Biden Warns Russia Against Using Unconventional Weapons
description: Some officials worry that the more cornered Vladimir Putin feels, particularly with recent setbacks from Ukraine’s counteroffensive, the greater the chance that he might turn to an unconventional weapon.
